body:
if someone is trying to kill me on my team can I kill them before I die? I have this issue a lot and I just got banned for it. :(
can someone help me I don't know if its bannable or not.
body_tagged:

can someone help me I don't know if its bannable or not.
title: Is this bannable?

replies.body: Team killing is against the rules, in all circumstances.

replies.body: You have to understand the pressure it puts on the Mods. Say a moderator gets a team-killing report from a player, they go to the game but all they see is the person who reported somebody for team-killing, killing the person that they reported. It puts the Moderator in an awkward position.
replies.body_tagged: You have to understand the pressure it puts on the Mods. Say a moderator gets a team-killing report from a player, they go to the game but all they see is the person who reported somebody for team-killing, killing the person that they reported. It puts the Moderator in an awkward position.

reply_to.body: That seems a bit extreme though. He was just defending himself and that person probably killed several teammates themselves.

replies.body: Team-killing is not allowed under ANY circumstance. If it was allowed when someone is trying to team-kill you, the mod wouldn't know who started it, and there would be loads of confusion on who to punish. The other problem is, it isn't your first offense. If someone is team-killing, you /report them, and you may not see a mod in game, because they could be spectating. You just have to be patient, and wait for assistance.
replies.body_tagged: Team-killing is not allowed under ANY circumstance. If it was allowed when someone is trying to team-kill you, the mod wouldn't know who started it, and there would be loads of confusion on who to punish. The other problem is, it isn't your first offense. If someone is team-killing, you /report them, and you may not see a mod in game, because they could be spectating. You just have to be patient, and wait for assistance.

replies.body:
Never team grief a team griefer. If you do, then you have become a team griefer yourself regardless of the situation.

Never kill a team killer. If you do, then you have become a team killer yourself regardless of the situation.

Never spleef a team spleefer. If you do, then you have become a team spleefer yourself regardless of the situation.
replies.body_tagged:
Never team grief a team griefer. If you do, then you have become a team griefer yourself regardless of the situation.

Never kill a team killer. If you do, then you have become a team killer yourself regardless of the situation.

Never spleef a team spleefer. If you do, then you have become a team spleefer yourself regardless of the situation.

replies.body: If you break the same rule twice you will be given a more harsher punishment, this stops people from breaking the same rule over and over again.

IMO BTW!
